item.description:
Join us on the PHONE to share and support each other in our journey of applying the Law of Attraction in our lives.

MARILOU SEAVEY, our special guest at our October 10/2 meetup will be on the call too.
She will discuss in detail one of the most significant & powerful NLP tools that
you can continue to apply through time. Also she will provide re-languaging skills
you can use to reinforce what you want to attract in life.

Marilou Seavey is an international facilitator of personal & professional change
and a Master Trainer of NLP (NeuroLinguistic Programming).
www.mindbridgetrainings.com

Thank you very much, Marilou, for being available to provide us with
more in depth understanding of how to turbocharge Law of Attraction
with NLP.


our Intent for the Tele-Meetup:
The safe and supportive yet casual atmosphere of the call is designed as a
way for us to continue to connect with like-hearted people in a very positive,
high-vibrational way. Let's celebrate successes and manifestations and help
each other with shared wisdom.

You're encouraged to bring your positive energy to the group... and yes,
please pass invite to other LOA practice-tioners.


How do you know if you're ready to join this tele-meetup?

- You've heard about the Law of Attraction, you're interested, and
want to know more.
- It seems like coincidences are happening in your life, but you don't
know what it means or why they're happening.
- You are not experiencing the results you want (and deserve) to have.
- You want to understand why the same bad things keep happening to
you over and over.
- You want to turn your dreams of living an ideal life into reality.
- You're willing to joyfully and generously share your knowledge and wisdom
regarding the powerful Law of Attraction with others.


To join, please REGISTER by emailing ChewHoong at chk.misc@gmail.com.

You'll get an e-mail confirmation with call-in details.


As always, we delight and treasure having you "chime" in!
ChewHoong and Dave

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: BostonLOA TELE-Meetup
